name: Landing (itch) (Nick)
description:
> Short and Fun 3D  Space Platformer Game

> HOW TO PLAY: 

     ⋙ Venture through each level's obstacles

     ⋙ Land on the green landing pad to get to the next level

     ⋙  Keybind Shortcuts:      

             R - Restart Level   

             C - Toggle Collision  

             L - Load next Level

             Escape - Close Game

____________________________________

Developers: 

Ibuki Nagasawa

Nicolas Kireyev
